name: 余琬琴
objective:
本課程乃針對高分子加工過程中，所遇到有關流力之問題，做一綜合性之概述。其主要內容包括：
(1)流體的性質與分類 (2)流體靜力 (3) 伯努力與能量方程式 (4) 管流 (5) Navier-Stokes 方程式
schedule:
1. Introduction and basic concepts
2. Properties of fluids
3. Pressure and fluid statics
4. Mass, Bernoulli, and energy equations
5. Flow in pipes
6. Differential analysis of fluid flow
materials:
1. Essentials of Fluid Mechanics by Cimbala and Cengel, McGraw Hill (滄海)
2. Fluid Mechanics, fundamentals and applications. 作者: Y. A. Cengel and J. M. Cimbala, 導讀: 黃振康, McGraw Hill (高立)
